meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'wec_contentelements'

data.languageKey:
<label index="tt_content.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.title"><%= params.contentName %> <label index="tt_content.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.description"><%= params.contentDescription %>
<label index="flexform.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.sheets.general">Contenu général <label index="flexform.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.bloc">Bloc <label index="flexform.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.title">Titre <label index="flexform.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.description">Description <label index="flexform.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.image">Image <label index="flexform.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.video">Vidéo <label index="tt_content.<%= params.slugifiedContentName %>.btnLabel">Jouer la vidéo
